api.definition: Application Programming Interface - A set of protocols and tools for building software applications

webhook.definition: HTTP callback that sends real-time data to your application when specific events occur

oauth.definition: Open Authorization - A standard for secure API authorization without sharing passwords

sandbox.definition: A testing environment that mimics production but uses fake data and transactions

bearer-token.definition: A security token that grants access to protected resources when included in API requests

payment-intent.definition: An object that represents your intent to collect payment from a customer

settlement.definition: The process of transferring funds from the payment processor to your bank account

chargeback.definition: A payment reversal initiated by the customer's bank, usually due to a dispute
